channel.title: Forum of Lies 15 - The Blue Dragon win!
channel.description:
## [color=blue]Welcome to Forum of Lies 15![/color] <small>Hosted by Marluxion and Co-Hosted by Sam17z</small>
### [color=blue] Rules [/color]
https://forum.imperium42.com/t/forum-of-lies-official-hub/1515
### [color=blue] Gameplay [/color] Days will be 3 IRL days long, or shorter if someone dies Nights will be 1 IRL day long Actions are done by messaging me Unseen/Cult will talk through a special Discord server Priest will speak with the dead through a separate Discord server All classes will be used, and will be used as they are found in the [Class Cards Thread](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fol-class-cards-now-officially-official/1998/) When you receive a card you will have 24 hours to reply, confirming you have received it
### [color=blue] Executions [/color] To accuse someone say "**/accuse [player]**" or "**/vote [player]**" Once majority is reached to accuse someone, a trial will begin. Either after 24 hours or once a trial reaches majority on pardon/execute, the trial will end. After the trial ends, the King has 12 hours to choose to allow or veto the vote, if the king does not respond the vote is allowed Executions end the Day
### [color=blue] Journals [/color] Message me your entire journal, the last draft I receive before you die shall be the one displayed
### [color=blue] To Join[/color] To join, simply express interest in joining by saying something like "I want to join" or "/join" or "/in" or "sign me up, coach" or whatever you want
# [color=blue]Players: [/color] 1. **Firekitten - Alive** 2. **Simon - Alive** 3. [color=red]**PoisonedSquid - Dead**[/color] - **[color=grey]The Demon[/color]** 4. **TheItalian - Alive** 5. [color=gold]**Ashe - Alive (Revived)**[/color] - **[color=steblue]Sheriff[/color]** 6. **Techwolves - Alive** 7. **Celeste_Ludenberg - Alive** 8. **Psychoneirik - Alive** 9. [color=red]**Insanity - Dead**[/color] - **[color=grey]The Fool[/color]** 10. **Moleland - Alive** 11. **Marcus_Doodalee - Alive** 12. **Shurian - Alive** 13. **Boss110 - Alive** 14. [color=red]**MTheJoker - Dead**[/color] - **[color=steblue]The Prince[/color]** 15. **Frostwolf103 - Alive** :crown: 16. [color=red]**Vulgard - Dead**[/color] - **[color=steblue]The Maid[/color]**
Backups: PokemonKidRyan, , Memesky Spectator: Twil1ght Pseudo-Blacklist: Memesky (Pseudo-Blacklist = can only join after the thread has been up for 48 hours. Low priority join >:| )
# [color=blue]Shortcuts[/color] :chains: [**Start of Game** ](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/forum-of-lies-15-day-2-15-16-alive-copout/67100/131?u=marluxion) [**Start of Day 2** ](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/forum-of-lies-15-day-2-15-16-alive-copout/67100/490?u=marluxion) [**Start of D3**](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/forum-of-lies-15-day-2-15-16-alive-copout/67100/2480?u=marluxion)

I wouldn’t have accepted that and I have turned the table around.

item.description:
Fuck off. I was suspected of being the convert for no reason at all, and if I flipped Italian was dead anyway. My best bet was to bus him which I tried to do but whatever, this game was bullshit and you should feel bad for try harding it so much and making it impossible for scum.

Read full topic

Game was over anyway. The entire unseen team was under suspicion because you guys did a Fucking scummy day two mass claim

You and Italian were suspected the moment you kill the prince which was Italian’s responsibility and thought “Oh free kill” no it doesn’t work like that.

Read full topic
